com.metreeca.rest

Class Xtream<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.Xtream<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the extended stream elements
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, BaseStream<T,Stream<T>>, Stream<T>

    public final class Xtream<T>
extends Object
implements Stream<T>
    Extended stream.

        public static <V,R> Function<V,R> guard(Function<V,R> function)
        Creates a guarded function.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the function input value
        R - the type of the function return value
        Parameters:
        function - the function to be guarded
        Returns:
        a guarded function that takes an input value and returns the value generated by applying function to it if no exception is thrown in the process or null otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if function is null

      • optMap

        public <R> Xtream<R> optMap(Function<? super T,Optional<R>> mapper)
        Maps elements to optional values.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the optional value returned by mapper
        Parameters:
        mapper - a function mapping elements to optional values
        Returns:
        an extended stream produced by applying mapper to each element of this extended stream and replacing it with the value of non-null and non-empty optionals
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null

      • bagMap

        public <R> Xtream<R> bagMap(Function<? super T,? extends Collection<R>> mapper)
        Maps elements to collection of values.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the value in the collection returned by mapper
        Parameters:
        mapper - a function mapping elements to collection of values
        Returns:
        an extended stream produced by applying mapper to each element of this extended stream and replacing it with the values of non-null collections
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null

      • groupBy

        public <K> Xtream<Map.Entry<K,List<T>>> groupBy(Function<T,K> classifier)
        Groups elements.
        Type Parameters:
        K - the type of the key returned by classifier
        Parameters:
        classifier - a function mapping elements to a grouping key
        Returns:
        an extended stream produced by applying classifier to each element of this extended stream and returning a stream of entries mapping each grouping key returned by classifier to the list of the elements matching the grouping key
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if classifier is null

      • groupBy

        public <K,V> Xtream<Map.Entry<K,V>> groupBy(Function<T,K> classifier,
                                            Collector<T,?,V> downstream)
        Groups and collects elements.
        Type Parameters:
        K - the type of the key returned by classifier
        V - the type of the value returned by the downstream collector
        Parameters:
        classifier - a function mapping elements to their grouping key
        downstream - a collector for sub-streams of this extended stream
        Returns:
        an extended stream produced by applying classifier to each element of this extended stream and returning a stream of entries mapping each grouping key returned by classifier to the value produced by collection the stream of the elements matching the grouping key using the downstream collector
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either classifier or downstream is null

      • batch

        public Xtream<Collection<T>> batch(int size)
        Batches elements.
        Parameters:
        size - the batch size limit (0 for no limits)
        Returns:
        an extended stream produced by collecting the elements of this extended stream in batches of at most size elements if size is greater than 0 or in a single batch otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if size is negative

      • loop

        public Xtream<T> loop(Function<? super Xtream<T>,? extends Stream<T>> mapper)
        Recursively expands this extended stream.
        Parameters:
        mapper - a function mapping from/to extended streams of elements of the same type of the elements of this extended stream
        Returns:
        an extended stream produced by recursively applying mapper to this extended stream and expanding it with the elements of the returned streams until no new elements are generated; null returned streams are considered to be empty
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null

      • iter

        public Xtream<T> iter(int steps,
                      Function<? super Xtream<T>,? extends Stream<T>> mapper)
        Iteratively expands this extended stream.
        Parameters:
        steps - the number of expansion steps to be performed
        mapper - a function mapping from/to extended streams of elements of the same type of the elements of this extended stream
        Returns:
        an extended stream produced by iteratively applying mapper this this extended stream and replacing it with with the elements of the returned streams until steps cycles are performed null returned streams are considered to be empty
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if steps is negative
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null

      • pipe

        public <R> Xtream<R> pipe(Function<? super Xtream<T>,? extends Stream<R>> mapper)
        Processes this extended stream.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the elements of the extended stream returned by mapper
        Parameters:
        mapper - a function mapping from/to extended streams
        Returns:
        an extended stream produced by applying mapper to this extended stream or an empty extended stream if mapper returns a null value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null
